sentences.sContent: Move the pots outside when the seeds begin to sprout.
sentences.sCn: 种子开始发芽时把盆搬到外面去。

sentences.sContent: Trees were starting to sprout new leaves.

remMethod.val: spr(看做spring， 春天) + out(出) → 春天来了， 柳树发芽了 → 发芽； 新芽

trans.tranCn: 发芽，抽条，生长；迅速出现，涌现出
trans.tranOther: if vegetables, seeds, or plants sprout, they start to grow, producing  shoots  ,  buds  , or leaves
a new growth on a plant
